# CSharpGenerator.SupportJsonSourceGeneration property

True to support `System.Text.Json` source generation.

```csharp
public bool SupportJsonSourceGeneration { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

Unless [`JsonSourceGenerationCondition`](./JsonSourceGenerationCondition.md) is set, the corresponding code is surrounded by `#if NET8_0_OR_GREATER`.
